context: No peaks corresponding to the studied substances were detected in the blanks. In contrast to the hydrogen sulfide and organic sulfur gas flux samplings of 20 min duration each, the sampling time for SO2 was more than an hour in order to improve detection. SO2 samples were analyzed right after the sampling while other samples were kept in a freezer after the extraction according to the NIOSH methods referred above. Gas chromatographic determinations with FPD-S and ion chromatographic analyses were carried out at the Stuttgart University, Germany. GC-chemilumiscence analyses were carried out by means of a Hewlett Packard instrument at the petroleum refinery in Izmir, Turkey. Measurement results of the source emission concentrations and ambient air are presented in Table 1 . During the first series of tests in June, Meles–Arap joint segment was highly polluted with organic sulfur compounds.
